name: potpourri
content:
Add to word list

[ U ] a mixture of dried petals and leaves from various flowers and plants that is used to give a room a pleasant smell: a bowl of potpourri
Dave King/ Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
[ S ] an unusual or interesting mixture of things: Her new TV show will be a potpourri of arts and media reports.
